H0.text: known as the punk poet who used poetry in their music. Attila the Stockbroker

H1.text: known as the punk poet who used poetry in their music. Shane MacGowan

H2.text: known as the punk poet who used poetry in their music. Jello Biafra

H3.text: known as the punk poet who used poetry in their music. John Cooper Clarke

A4.text: John Cooper Clarke was often referred to as a 'punk poet' in the late 1970s.

A5.text: He put my poetry to music but I couldn't think of an argument against it.
